title: Cozy Conversation Studio
content:
Warm. Intimate. Relaxed.

A soft, inviting atmosphere featuring plush armchairs, warm lighting,
and gentle wood accents — designed for comfortable, open dialogue.

Perfect for lifestyle podcasts, intimate one-on-one interviews, or series about self-development, psychology, and personal stories.

The cozy setup and neutral palette make it ideal for emotional, human-centered conversations that feel like a fireside chat.

title: Velvet Lounge Studio
content:
Moody. Cinematic. Bold.

Rich pink drapery and dark, cozy armchairs create a cinematic ambience with a touch of drama.

Perfect for creative storytelling, art and film podcasts, or deep, emotional discussions — especially those with visual flair.

The soft lighting and contrasty tones make every frame feel like part of a movie scene.

title: Contemporary Table Studio
content:
Balanced. Refined. Professional.

A clean, symmetrical composition featuring natural wood textures and minimalist decor.

Ideal for business, tech, or entrepreneurship podcasts, round-table discussions, or interviews with experts.

The space gives off a professional yet approachable vibe — perfect for structured conversations with substance and style.

title: Minimalist Aesthetic Studio
content:
Bright. Airy. Natural.

This studio embraces Scandinavian minimalism — natural light, soft beige tones, and simple organic forms.

It’s ideal for thoughtful discussions, design and culture podcasts, or educational conversations that require a calm, uncluttered visual environment.

The natural textures and spacious feel enhance the focus on the guests and their words
